data.text: Aduane mmɔwe a asomdwoeɛ wɔ ho
Ɔsomfoɔ nyansafoɔ bɛdi ɔba nimguasefoɔ so,
Kyɛmferɛ wɔ hɔ ma dwetɛ na fononoo wɔ hɔ ma sikakɔkɔɔ
Omumuyɛfoɔ tie nsusuiɛ bɔne;
Deɛ ɔdi ahiafoɔ ho fɛ no bu wɔn Yɛfoɔ animtiaa;
Mmanananom yɛ mmasiriwa animuonyam,
Anokrokro nyɛ mma ɔkwasea,
Kɛtɛasehyɛ daadaa deɛ ɔma;
Deɛ ɔbu nʼani gu mfomsoɔ so no ma ɔdɔ ɛkwan,
Nkaanim sɔ onipa a ɔwɔ nhunumu ani
Onipa bɔnefoɔ ani wɔ atuateɛ nko ara so
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛhyia sisire a wɔawia ne mma
Sɛ obi de bɔne tua papa so ka a,
Ntɔkwa ahyɛaseɛ te sɛ deɛ wɔretue suka;
Sɛ wɔbɛgyaa deɛ ɔdi fɔ ne sɛ wɔbɛbu deɛ ɔdi bem kumfɔ no,
Sika a ɛwɔ ɔkwasea nsam ho nni mfasoɔ,
Adamfo kyerɛ ɔdɔ ɛberɛ nyinaa mu,
Obi a ɔnni adwene no na ɔde ne nsa hyɛ krataa ase di akagyinamu
Deɛ ɔpɛ ntɔkwa no dɔ bɔne;
Onipa a ɔwɔ akoma kontonkyi no nnya nkɔsoɔ;
Deɛ ɔwo ɔba kwasea no di awerɛhoɔ;
Akoma mu anigyeɛ yɛ aduro ɛsa yadeɛ,
Omumuyɛfoɔ gye adanmudeɛ wɔ esum ase
Onipa a ɔwɔ nhunumu no ani kɔ nyansa so,
Ɔba kwasea hyɛ nʼagya awerɛhoɔ,
Ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔtwe deɛ ɔdi bem aso,
Ɔnimdefoɔ dwene nʼanom kasa ho,
Mpo sɛ ɔkwasea yɛ dinn a wɔbu no sɛ ɔnyansafoɔ,
